pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Quickstart-VDKThis is the first VDK packaging that users would install to play around with.It packages:* Plugin for a local database to get started quickly* Plugin for job management (vdk-control-cli)* Plugin for local Control Service installation (vdk-server)See also [Versatile Data Kit Getting Started](https://github.com/vmware/versatile-data-kit/wiki/Getting-Started).
